instruction: 展示 Category 编号与 Topology 信息

evaluate.key: lambda dump: [param for param in [item for item in dump['windows'] if item['name'] == 'boundary_region@PERMANENT'][0]['_data'][1]['params'] if param['name'] == 'display']
evaluate.pred: lambda key, value: all([val in key[0]['value'] for val in value])
